info.description: Account management service for FinTrack application
info.title: FinTrack Account Service API

get.description: Retrieve all accounts belonging to a specific user
Retrieve all cards owned by a user across all their accounts
Retrieve account details by account ID

post.description: Add funds to a virtual wallet account

get.description: Get the available credit limit for a credit card account
Get the current balance of an account

put.description: Update the balance of an account

get.description: Retrieve all cards associated with an account

post.description: Create a new card associated with an account

get.description: Retrieve a specific card by its ID

put.description: Block a card to prevent its usage
Set a specific card as the default for its account
Unblock a card to allow its usage
Update the closing and due dates for a credit card account
Update the credit limit for a credit card account

post.description: Withdraw funds from a virtual wallet account

400.description: Invalid request data or insufficient funds

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
